title: Internships - IGERT Electronic Security and Privacy: Technological, Human, Enterprise, and Legal Considerations
contents: Search this site     Program Overview Sponsors FAQ People Faculty Staff Fellows Associates Alumni Research Publications Curriculum Courses Seminars Outreach International Partners Links And Resources Internships CyberCorps SFS Alumni HS-STEM Scholarships Apply           News ESP-IGERT Calendar Departments Contact Us Sitemap            Internships     FBI Cyber Internship Application Period Open Now Through December 8, 2014 Below is a short summary of the requirements necessary to apply: •  Enrolled full-time in an accredited school or university; •  Pursuing a computer related degree (see brochure for examples of preferred degrees •  Currently a sophomore, junior, senior or graduate student; and •  Have a 3.0 cumulative GPA or higher at the time of application https://www.fbijobs.gov/2311.asp For Undergraduates Paid Summer 2015 Undergraduate Research Placements: Over 800 programs – REU, NASA and other paid summer research opportunities for undergrads http://www.pathwaystoscience.org/undergrads.aspx  Financial Support while in Graduate School Fellowships and graduate programs in a wide variety of STEM disciplines: http://www.pathwaystoscience.org/grad.aspx  Opportunities in Engineering http://www.pathwaystoscience.org/engineering.aspx NASA-supported internships, fellowships and scholarships http://intern.nasa.gov                        Sign in | Recent Site Activity | Report Abuse | Print Page | Powered By  Google Sites
